job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Content marketing platforms are facing unprecedented challenges: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI are harder than ever. Despite the promise of AI, many solutions out there only scratch the surface, offering generic models that don't quite address the complex needs of content marketing teams. This means wasted time, underutilized resources, and missed growth opportunities for enterprises.

   At Contently, we're going beyond basic automation, using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs. In this role, you will explore and implement AI solutions that directly change how global brands create, optimize, and measure their content strategies. It's not just about developing features; it's about transforming an industry.

   This role is tailor-made for someone who craves technical challenge. You'll not only be building end-to-end AI solutions-from writing custom algorithms and integrating machine learning models to deploying scalable cloud-based services-but you'll also have the freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies. You'll have access to vast datasets, the freedom to iterate fast, and a direct line to see the impact your work has on real users. If you're the kind of engineer who loves to experiment, push boundaries, and innovate in a way that directly impacts product direction, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.

   Join our team, where every line of code you write contributes to reshaping an industry. You'll work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management, ensuring your innovations translate into features that make a measurable difference for users. If this sounds like your kind of challenge, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
     * Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently, * Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, Contently (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Content marketing platforms are facing unprecedented challenges: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI are harder than ever. Despite the promise of AI, many solutions out there only scratch the surface, offering generic models that don't quite address the complex needs of content marketing teams. This means wasted time, underutilized resources, and missed growth opportunities for enterprises.

   At Contently, we're going beyond basic automation, using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs. In this role, you will explore and implement AI solutions that directly change how global brands create, optimize, and measure their content strategies. It's not just about developing features; it's about transforming an industry.

   This role is tailor-made for someone who craves technical challenge. You'll not only be building end-to-end AI solutions-from writing custom algorithms and integrating machine learning models to deploying scalable cloud-based services-but you'll also have the freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies. You'll have access to vast datasets, the freedom to iterate fast, and a direct line to see the impact your work has on real users. If you're the kind of engineer who loves to experiment, push boundaries, and innovate in a way that directly impacts product direction, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.

   Join our team, where every line of code you write contributes to reshaping an industry. You'll work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management, ensuring your innovations translate into features that make a measurable difference for users. If this sounds like your kind of challenge, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
     * Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently, * Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use of LLMs and AI to build user-facing features and applications, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on developing end-to-end AI solutions, experimenting with new AI technologies, and integrating them into a platform supports this classification.

phrases: using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs
Develop AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently
Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs
writing custom algorithms
integrating machine learning models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development, implementation, and integration of AI models, specifically mentioning LLMs and custom algorithms, which are central to generative AI and machine learning tasks.

phrases: building end-to-end AI solutions
deploying scalable cloud-based services
Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs
job_tasks.justification: The description highlights building complete AI solutions, deploying services, and developing features/applications, which are core software development activities for integrating AI into products.

phrases: deploying scalable cloud-based services
job_tasks.justification: The mention of deploying scalable cloud-based services points towards the operational aspects of making AI solutions production-ready and maintainable.

job_tasks.justification: These phrases demonstrate an understanding of the business context, the challenges in content marketing, and the goal of using AI to solve these problems and drive business value.

phrases: You'll have access to vast datasets
job_tasks.justification: While not extensively detailed, the mention of 'vast datasets' implies a need for data handling and potentially engineering to support the AI models.
